country_code.description: The country code associated with the user

created_at.description: The datetime when the user account was created

join_date.description: The date when the user joined the platform

enabled.description: Flag indicating if the user account is currently enabled

is_admin.description: Flag indicating if the user has admin privileges

is_guest.description: Flag indicating if the user is considered a guest user

is_pending.description: Flag indicating if the user account is pending approval

is_view_only.description: Flag indicating if the user has view-only permissions

is_verified.description: Flag indicating if the user account is verified

photo_original.description: URL of the user's original photo

photo_small.description: URL of the user's small-sized photo

photo_thumb.description: URL of the user's thumbnail photo

photo_thumb_small.description: URL of the user's small-sized thumbnail photo

photo_tiny.description: URL of the user's tiny-sized photo

time_zone_identifier.description: The identifier of the user's timezone

utc_hours_diff.description: The difference in hours from UTC timezone
